page.title: 05FARMS.
page.content: Marie and Kirsty decided to go and ask the farm owners or workers about the farm. People responded and helped very well,and we were very interested. {Wheat}and{barley}seems to be mostly grown.Most of the people we interviewed were tenent farmers,but one was the owner and he said that when he started working on the farm in August,nineteen thirty nine he had to employ two and a half men (not literally)to every hundred acres,but now he farms two thousand acres.This means that he should be employing fifty men now but in fact he only employs eight.They all said they enjoy working on the farm.Most people said that things have changed much over the years,and they are very pleased that they have,because now they have so much mechanical machinery they don't get worn out so much.
